## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand, account for potential variability, and maintain a healthy stock level while staying within lead time. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  5,000 units higher than the player's planned order.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  ~6 days                              |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  ~14 days                             |
| Comments                          | This recommendation prioritizes meeting the forecasted demand while accounting for potential variability. It ensures adequate stock coverage, considering lead time and shelf life, while also maintaining a healthy inventory level. This approach avoids stockouts and optimizes inventory turnover. |
